channel.title: HackBack بالعربية
channel.itunes:subtitle: Offensive Security Podcast.
channel.itunes:author: Mazin Ahmed
channel.itunes:summary: HackBack is an offensive security podcast that discusses security highlights and insights. Each week we talk about the highlights for cybersecurity as well as exploring interesting security topics.
channel.description: HackBack is an offensive security podcast that discusses security highlights and insights. Each week we talk about the highlights for cybersecurity as well as exploring interesting security topics.

item.title: البداية
item.itunes:author: Mazin Ahmed
item.itunes:subtitle: HackBack بالعربية: البداية
item.itunes:summary: Episode 1 - The Start. This is the first episode of HackBack podcast. The podcast talks about Empire Framework, Python 2.X EOL, Github Critical Vulnerability, NGINX HTTP Request Smuggling, Citrix ADP RCE, OWASP API Security Top 10 2019, and the biggest cloud-related hacks of 2019
item.description: Episode 1 - The Start. This is the first episode of HackBack podcast. The podcast talks about Empire Framework, Python 2.X EOL, Github Critical Vulnerability, NGINX HTTP Request Smuggling, Citrix ADP RCE, OWASP API Security Top 10 2019, and the biggest cloud-related hacks of 2019 This is the first episode of HackBack podcast. The podcast talks about Empire Framework, Python 2.X EOL, Github Critical Vulnerability, NGINX HTTP Request Smuggling, Citrix ADP RCE, OWASP API Security Top 10 2019, and the biggest cloud-related hacks of 2019 Show Notes Available at https://mazinahmed.net/hackback-ar/2020/episode-1.html.
